description: Create a CSV import job. Accepts CreateImportJobInput with s3Key (required, String, max 500 chars), s3Bucket (optional, String, max 255 chars), service (optional, enum: contact, company, for metadata), retryCount (optional, Int). Uses ConnectraClient.create_job with job_type 'insert_csv_file'. Creates UserImport record in database (non-blocking - failures don't stop job creation). Returns Job with uuid, jobType, status, data, createdAt. CSV can contain both contact and company data - Connectra auto-processes both. Raises ValidationError (422) if s3Key is empty.
graphql_operation: mutation CreateImportJob($input: CreateImportJobInput!) { imports { createImportJob(input: $input) { uuid jobType status data createdAt } } }
